segments.text: Did you hear about car accident on Spring Road yesterday ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I did . I heard that they took both drivers to hospital . One needed surgery .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . I heard he had a few broken bones too , but that the doctors have set the fractures without any problems .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The second driver was luckier . He had a concussion and needed some stitches for his head wound .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . He was released from hospital yesterday evening . The other man could be there for weeks .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand that he ’ s connected to a heart monitor and breathing apparatus . His condition can ’ t be very good .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The hospital announced this morning that his condition is poor but stable . What does that mean ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It means he ’ s really badly injured , but he will almost certainly survive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: His family will be pleased to hear that . They must have been so worried .
segments.speaker: S1
